Package ohos.agp.text.richstyles

Class BackgroundColorRichStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.text.richstyles.RichStyle
      • ohos.agp.text.richstyles.BackgroundColorRichStyle

  • public class BackgroundColorRichStyle
extends RichStyle
    Implements rich styles for the background color. This class must be used in a RichText instance.
    Since:
    7
    See Also:
    RichText.setRichStyle(RichStyle, int, int, RangedRichStyle.Flag)
